long_description: The oversized Spy Platoon snow goggles deliver a wide field of vision and feature special frame vents to maximize fog protection. Plus, they come with a spare lens for all-conditions versatility. Bronze lens has a bronze tint with 21% visible light transmission (VLT) and a multilayer red mirror finish to cut glare and offer excellent definition in bright, sunny light. Spare Persimmon lens has a bronze tint with 53% VLT, delivering increased contrast in overcast, flat light conditions. Large spherical lens tapers from the optical center toward the periphery for a wide field of vision with minimal distortion. Double-layer thermal lens creates a thermal barrier between the cold outside air and the warm air next to your face, helping reduce fogging. Antifog and antiscratch lens treatments help keep your vision clear and distortion-free. Strategically placed frame vents increase airflow to reduce fogging; flexible polyurethane frame ensures a comfortable fit. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Wide adjustable strap is backed with silicone ribbing so it stays in place, whether you're wearing a helmet or not. Please note: though the Platoon goggles come with a spare lens, the frame is not optimized for fast lens changes; some caution and effort will be necessary to change lenses.
